rules_text:
When this creature enters, choose one. – 
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature and enchantment card in your graveyard.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each creature and enchantment card in your graveyard.
notes:
A slow deck that fills its graveyard, then recurs huge threats over and over.
